alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 03 at 3:18PM HST until February 05 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A new west-northwest swell will build overnight and peak Friday. As this swell gradually diminishes, another pulse of northwest swell will arrive, maintaining high surf through Saturday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 6 PM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores. Surf 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, and Niihau. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 6 PM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution. Know your limits and seek ocean recreation areas best suited for your abilities. If in doubt, don`t go out.
